official.headline: Halden Passes
official.anchor_line: Marek Halden, a key technocrat, has passed away.
official.contextual_reframing: Despite the loss, Stenograd's resilient systems ensure continued stability and progress.

underground.headline: Halden Found Dead
underground.anchor_line: Marek Halden mysteriously dies in the heart of his high-security residence.
underground.contextual_reframing: His death coincides with failing systems and buried toxicology reports. Who's really in control now?
